name: politico
text:
On the first night of the #DemConvention, the party laid out its overarching message: If you don't like Donald Trump, you have a home with us.

Starting tonight through Thursday, the goal is to round out its nominee, Joe Biden https://t.co/KH1vAfVJpn

name: politico
text: The Biden campaign plans on ramping up rural outreach by running ads in rural media markets and targeting local newspapers and radio stations, as well as dispatching organizers to rural areas in states like Pennsylvania and Wisconsin https://t.co/0XeYsoM7qj

name: politico
text:

text:

text:

text:
By hosting the Republican National Convention second, Trump's team hopes to give him the last word and use this week as an instructive exercise in what works and what doesn‚Äôt before they take the stage next week

text:

But teachers unions now risk squandering the outpouring of goodwill

text:

name: politico
text:
Bill Clinton characterized the Trump White House as chaotic and incapable of accepting responsibility when contrasting the president with Joe Biden.

And his #DNC2020Convention address echoed the charges leveled by Michelle Obama the previous night https://t.co/oxtBIM48ey https://t.co/EB28Rpl6X4

name: politico
text:
Clinton went after Trump's #COVID response, pointing out that the U.S. is the only industrialized country to triple its unemployment amid the crisis.

He said Trump‚Äòs character is not one geared to combating a global emergency like the pandemic https://t.co/hhvsexLKad

name: politico
text:
Spotted: Khizr Khan, Trump antagonist and Gold Star father, casted Virginia's votes in tonight's virtual #DemConvention.

Khan gave one of the most memorable speeches at the 2016 DNC. https://t.co/lGJX7c4yPd https://t.co/QWVNQsb47v

name: politico
text:
Ady Barkan has been one of the most vocal Medicare for All advocates in the U.S.

His appearance tonight is meant to signal that Medicare for All supporters are welcome in the party and, again, that health care is a priority to Biden, says @hollyotterbein
https://t.co/HFGbViklyB

name: politico
text:
Former Republican Colin Powell appeared at tonight's #DemConvention to hammer home Biden's foreign policy and national security bona fides. ‚ÄúNot a huge surprise since Powell also endorsed Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton,‚Äù says editor @PoliticoCharlie.

https://t.co/lGJX7cmadN

name: politico
text:
Joe Biden has officially secured the Democratic nomination for president.

He's undoubtedly imagined this moment for more than 30 years ‚Äì although this setup might not have been exactly what he had in mind, says @POLITICO_Steve https://t.co/bac19y5oCa https://t.co/jzdVIlvyo6

name: politico
text: Former Deputy AG Sally Yates kicked off her #DNC2020Convention speech by noting that ‚Äúspeaking at a political convention is something I never expected to be doing,‚Äù but she argued that the stakes of the election are too high not to https://t.co/Iu7plRJxSv https://t.co/X34sXcFMmo

name: politico
text: Yates, who served at DOJ under both GOP and Democratic presidents for nearly 30 years, stepped in as the acting chief for 10 days ‚Äî before Trump fired her for ‚Äúrefusing to defend President Trump's shameful and unlawful Muslim travel ban,‚Äù she said https://t.co/UVL9Am6Lfo

name: politico
text:
‚ÄúFrom the moment President Trump took office, he's used his position to benefit himself rather than our country,‚Äù Yates said, accusing President Trump of attempting to ‚Äúweaponize‚Äù the DOJ.

‚ÄúPut simply, he treats our country like it's his family business" https://t.co/UVL9Am6Lfo

name: politico
text:
Dr. Jill Biden's speech doubles as voter outreach to parents and teachers, says @hollyotterbein, both of whom are frustrated with the situation right now in schools due to coronavirus

Follow our DNC live analysis:
https://t.co/HFGbViklyB

name: politico
text:

name: politico
text:

More takeaways on DNC Night Two:
https://t.co/HFGbViklyB

name: politico
text:

name: politico
text:
‚ÄúHow do you make a broken family whole? The same way you make a nation whole,‚Äù Jill Biden said at the #DemConvention. ‚ÄúWith love and understanding and with small acts of kindness, with bravery, with unwavering faith.‚Äù

name: politico
text:
Progressives aren't happy that Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez was only given 60 seconds to speak at the DNC. It's unclear whether she would have spoken at all if Bernie Sanders hadn't asked her to second his nomination.

name: politico
text:

text:
